meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fathomless.
meanings.sent1: The fathomlessnesses of the ocean amazed the young explorers.
meanings.sent2: The fathomlessnesses of space are beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The fathomlessnesses of the mystery novel kept the readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a fathomlessnesses that seemed to reveal the depths of her soul.
meanings.sent5: The fathomlessnesses of the forest at night filled him with a sense of wonder.

meanings.definition: The extent or depth that cannot be measured or understood.
meanings.sent1: The fathomlessnesses of the canyon left the hikers in awe.
meanings.sent2: The fathomlessnesses of the universe are a source of endless fascination.
meanings.sent3: The fathomlessnesses of the professor's knowledge seemed to have no limits.
meanings.sent4: His gaze seemed to penetrate the fathomlessnesses of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The fathomlessnesses of the night sky sparkled with countless stars.
